mapper.insert:
insert into year_report (cid, year, number_of_employees, total_assets, total_liabilities, total_operating_income, main_business_income, total_profit, net_profit, total_tax, total_owner_equity) values
( #{item.cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.numberOfEmployees,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalAssets,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalLiabilities,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalOperatingIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mainBusinessIncome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalProfit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.netProfit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalOwnerEquity,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
